data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 1,794 believers in the county of Territoire de Belfort to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Territoire de Belfort, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 146,000 citizens of Territoire de Belfort, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Territoire de Belfort, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Lord, the believers in the county of Territoire de Belfort, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Jew, Swiss-speaking people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Jew, Swiss-speaking people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Jew, Swiss-speaking people is yours.
Lord, please give the 1,794 believers in the county of Territoire de Belfort the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Territoire de Belfort.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Territoire de Belfort, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France has a population of 146,000.

We estimate Territoire de Belfort has 1,794 people who might know Jesus, 89,282 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 54,924 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 1,794 believers in Territoire de Belfort, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.
